welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lochearn, a charming and picturesque city nestled in the heart of the United States. Known for its tranquil lakes, beautiful nature trails, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make memories to last a lifetime!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is used for private and charter flights and offers exclusive services such as a VIP lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
